name: With the Souls of Trees
description:
Living in a place where the forest around them holds the greatest mysteries, Keaton meets four strangers who call themselves the guardians of that forest. They ask for Keaton's aid in stopping a strange destruction spreading through the wood and the mysteries of their creation come to light, presenting some darker truth.

My first visual novel may be simple and messy, but I love their mix of visuals and writing  so I hope you enjoy it all the same! Thank you and please look forward to my next project!

  • Over 40k words!
  • 4 different paths
  • No bad endings
